issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing Kitchensink, Base UI>Vertical Layout>Table View, I scrolled the tableview and noticed some of the row text at the bottom of some of the rows is cut off.  See attached screenshot.

Occurs on:
Nexus S 2.3.4
Nexus One 2.2.2
Xoom, 3.2 (portrait only)

Does not occur on:
Galaxy Tab 2.3.4

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.8.0 on Nexus S
2) Navigate to Base UI>Vertical Layout>Table View
3) scroll the table and examine the text in each row.


Result:
The text of some of the rows is cut off at the bottom of the row.

Expected result:
Text for each row fully visible in the row.

Notes:
Also occurs with 1.7.2
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Base UI>Vertical Layout>Table View has text cut off at bottom of some of the table rows
fields.environment: Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535, SDK 1.8.0.v20110819142548 on Nexus S 2.3.4, Xoom 3.2 (portrait only), Nexus one (2.2.2)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
